name: Plamen
lines:
(while wearing a school uniform): I hate my life! I am in the prime of it, yet I have no 
girlfriend, I am failing at most of my tests because I can't concentrate in class, my 
parents told me to get out of the house to an apartment they own even though I am 
only 17 and to top it all off, I'm broke!

Maaaaaan! This life is not worth it! I wish I could live in a different world in which I 
was free from it all. No more parental neglect, no more being penniless, no more being 
without a maiden by my side!

(Sign) I guess that only happens in anime and movies, so I will just be going to 
my small 100 square feet apartment.
